TopicTitle: BobCat Ind. - Colonization, exploring and research vehicle

Articles.Content:
Haven't you you posted this picture before? I can swear I've seen it already...

yeah probably in one of TT threads, showing the function of his wheels. Im not sure how to put things into spoilers. I was just trying to express my excitement about the new DEMs

i have one on the mun now helping with drilling and construction

Edited July 5, 2013 by viperwolf

yeah probably in one of TT threads, showing the function of his wheels. Im not sure how to put things into spoilers. I was just trying to express my excitement about the new DEMs

Hey, no worries! I just commented because it just looked really familiar.
what was the code to make the DEMVs work in .20 again?
New DEMVs will be awesome.....but cant hold a candle to HOME gen2 imo!
Weel, if Bobcat decides to throw in an optional Classic texture, i'm looking forward to it, otherwise nope.

what was the code to make the DEMVs work in .20 again?

This is what worked for me. Wrap the parts PARTS {} and delete the plugin, Use the plugin from HOME. Im running both the ant and DEMV 2

EDIT: is there an official bobcat thread where everyone is staying up to date? Other than this one?

Edited July 9, 2013 by viperwolf

Just found this mod, and kerbal actually. Been playing for a few days, I had mechjeb2 working perfectly but after installing the current version of RemoteTech, I seem to have no access at all to the mechjeb menus. I can toggle the mechjeb control button on the comms interface but if it's active, the flight computer can't hold a target at all and I see no evidence that mechjeb is running.

Grateful for some insight, i love both the mods and would like them to play nicely together

Sorry if this is a dupe but it seems to have gotten lost somewhere.

New to most of kerbal but yesterday I had mechjeb running nicely until I installed RemoteTech...I love both mods and it would be great if they could play nicely but I seem to have no access to mechjeb menus now, and the mechjeb integration into the comms interface doesn't seem to do anything of note.

Grateful for some insight
Is there an antenna on your ship? Do you have contact back to ksc ?

Is there an antenna on your ship? Do you have contact back to ksc ?

Yes, all connected via a network I just finished. I've tried reinstalling MJ over the top but still no change.
Just realised I was posting in completely the wrong thread, I had this and the RemoteTech threads open and...well heat and tiredness leads to careless posting. apologies.

Just realised I was posting in completely the wrong thread, I had this and the RemoteTech threads open and...well heat and tiredness leads to careless posting. apologies.

Haha, I was wondering if you realized this was the wrong thread. Good Luck though.
Please repost the mod with .20 changes and chassy / pod size mismatch fix.

Please repost the mod with .20 changes and chassy / pod size mismatch fix.

Sry but I can already tell you that's not going to happen. If I'm wrong, sorry, but Im pretty sure he just gonna continue working on the next generation of vehicles. But hey I could be wrong. Check the forum pages for easy corrections. Really, not hard to do.

This is what worked for me. Wrap the parts PARTS {} and delete the plugin, Use the plugin from HOME. Im running both the ant and DEMV 2

EDIT: is there an official bobcat thread where everyone is staying up to date? Other than this one?

Maybe the release thread. Both are pretty widely commented on.

Edit: this is the development thread so any new info on the next generation should be here.

Hi, i have a problem with downloading. For first i cant see that picture with "download" word. For second, when i click on that small error picture, i see "404 Not found". Am i only one or it is known problem?

Hi, i have a problem with downloading. For first i cant see that picture with "download" word. For second, when i click on that small error picture, i see "404 Not found". Am i only one or it is known problem?

All files can be found on SpacePort by searching DEMV, but require config file changes to make work in 0.20, the second generation is currently under production which Im guessing will be likely set for the 0.21 version (just guessing). Would require an official response from Bobcat to confirm this though.
